name: Public Otorhinolaryngology Entranhament session
description:
In the otorhinolaryngology pavillion at the Old Shore’s Federal University doctor Asmir Ptolomeus conducts studies on the influence of sound waves in a process he calls “entranhaments”. 

The studies have shown an association between auditory perception and overall health, lead researcher Doctor Asmir has reasons to believe this could open the path to a new discipline merging psycology, music therapy, sound engeneering and otorhinolaryngology. 

“Every day volunteers show up at the pavillion to participate in the studies and the results are promissing. However we can not eliminate the power of suggestion and placebo from the table yet”

- - - This article was written and drawn by edmarola. Music by @danielhercules
